SA20n1332:6: savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate |
SA20n1332:8: nirvāṇe pariṇāme saṃprakhyāne ca sarvālambaneṣu yā vaśavartitā |
SA20n1332:13: pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣyadauṣṭhulyāpagamātsarvatra ca jñeye jñānasyānāvaraṇāt jñānavaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānaviśuddhirityucyate |
SA20n1332:15: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ karmasvakajñānabalaṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalam indriyaparāparajñānabalaṃ nānā dhātujñānabalaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ cyutyupapattijñānabalam āsravakṣayajñānabalañca |
SA20n1332:16: ityetāni daśa tathāgatabalāni yuthā daśabalasūtre nirdeśato vistareṇa veditavyāni |
SA20n1332:17: [tatra] yatkiñcidanena bhāṣitaṃ lapitamudāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tattathā avitatheti tasmāttathāgata ityucyate |
SA20n1332:18: tatra phalasya śubhāśabhasya yo bhūtapravṛttaḥ aviṣamo hetuḥ tadasya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā niśrayo'bhinirvartakaṃ ityucyate |
SA20n1332:22: eṣāñca sarvajñānādīnāṃ padānāṃ pūrvavadvyākaraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ tadyathā paramabodhipaṭale |
SA20n1332:29: svayamadhigamya pareṣāmapyanukampayā vistareṇa prakāśanād brāhmacakraṃ pravartayatītyucyate |
SA20n1332:31: tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapi |
SA20n1332:33: evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa brahmā preritaṃ sarvasattvanikāye bhramati |
SA20n1332:35: agraprajñaptipatitasya niruttaraśāstṛsaṃpatparigṛhītasya cātmano vikhyāpanāt tanmārgadeśanayā ca sarvatadanyapāṣaṇḍapratikṣepaṇāt tanmārgavipratyanīkavādiṣu ca pratyupasthiteṣu asaṃkocātsarvaparavādābhibhavāya codāraniruttaravāgabhyudoraṇātpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadatītyucyate |
SA20n1332:37: teṣām uttānā vivṛtā prajñaptā prakāśitā bhavati |
SA20n1332:40: tasya cābhyupāyasya sarvajanyatāyo [yaḥ] kaścidākāṃkṣati devabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūtovā] sarveṇa tena mamaivāntikāllabhya eṣo'bhyupāya iti |
SA20n1332:43: sarvaṃ [ku] vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA20n1332:45: yāni naiva kṛtāni na niruddhāni nāpi karoti api tu kariṣyatyāyatyāṃ |
SA20n1332:47: yāni punaḥ karmāṇi naiva kṛtāni na niruddhānyapi tu kartumeva praṇihito vyavasitaḥ tāni pratyutpannānītyucyante |
SA20n1332:48: tāni punaḥprakārabhedena trīṇi kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma |
SA20n1332:53: yacca sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā vastvādhiṣṭhāya kriyante tatteṣāṃ vastu ityucyate |
SA20n1332:57: tadetadabhisamasya sarvakālaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvāvasthāprayogaṃ sarvadeśaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvanidānaṃ sarvādīnavānuśaṃsañca sarvākāraṃ tathāgatānāṃ karmajñānaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1332:61: dhyānavimokṣaiḥ karmaṇyacetasaścetovaśiprāptasya yathepsitasyārthasya samṛddhaye yā tasya tadanurūpasya samādheḥ samāpadyanatā tā samādhisamāpattirityucyate |
SA20n1332:64: yathā samāhite citte sarvo brahmalokaudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo babhūva |
SA20n1332:67: evaṃ hi tathāgato yaṃ yamevārthaṃ prasādhayitukāmo lokasādhāraṇaṃ [asādhāraṇaṃ vā] sa tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya laghuladhveva prasādhayati |
SA20n1332:68: tatradhyānavimokṣābhyāṃ cittavaśitayā ca cittādhīna-sarvepsitārthasamṛddhiḥ etāvacca sarvadhyāyīnāṃ karaṇīyam |
SA20n1332:70: taccaitad dhyāyikaraṇīyaṃ [sarvākāraṃ] tathāgatānāṃ tasmād dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattaya evocyante |
SA20n1332:76: teṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ vicitrāṇāmabhinirhṛtānāṃ nāmasaṃketena anurūpeṇa yathāyogaṃ vyavasthitirvyavasthānāmityucyate |
SA20n1332:77: eṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ pratilabdhānāmuttari yā bhāvanā-paripūrirnikāmalābhitā'kṛcchreṇānavarakalābhitā saiṣāṃ viśuddhirityucyate |
SA20n1332:78: tatra yathā caiṣāmaprāptiryathā ca prāptiḥ teṣu ca yā ca hīnatā yā ca praṇītatā yaccaiṣāṃ nāma yā cotkarṣaparyantatā tat sarvaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:80: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate |
SA20n1332:81: paraśraddhāpūrvā dharmavicāraṇā-pūrvā ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrā ruciḥ pratyavagamaḥ nānādhimuktikatetyucyate |
SA20n1332:83: śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate |
SA20n1332:84: teṣāmevāvatāra-mukhānurūpā pratipat tadyathā rāgacaritānāmaśubhā vistareṇa tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvatragāminī pratipadityucyate |
SA20n1332:90: vicitreṣu sattvanikāyeṣu tadyathā pūrveṣu dakṣiṇeṣu uttareṣu paścimeṣu nānā nāmasaṃketavyavasthānabhinneṣu aṣṭāsu vyavahārapadeṣvanugataṃ pūrvakeṣvabhyatītevātmabhāveṣu ṣaḍvidhaṃ samāsataścaritamanusmaratyanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāse samanusmaran |
SA20n1332:101: āhvānāya saṃketaḥ kṣatriyādayo varṇā mātāpitaraṃ bhojanapānavidhiḥ sampattivipattiḥ āryurvaicitryañca |
SA20n1332:102: tathā hi loke etānyaṣṭau vyavahārapadāni upaniśritya ṣaṭ caritāni pareṣāmātmano vyapadiśanto vyapadiśanti |
SA20n1332:105: brāhmaṇo vaiśyaḥ śūdro'hamayaṃ vā ayaṃ me pitā'sya va |
SA20n1332:108: manthān vā apūpān vā odānakulmāṣān vā pare vā |
SA20n1332:109: evaṃ rūpe'haṃ vyasane sampadi vā varte'yaṃ vā |
SA20n1332:110: evaṃrūpe'haṃ vayasi vyavasthito nave vā madhye vā vṛddhe vā |
SA20n1332:112: ityetāni ṣaḍ [aṣṭa] vyavahāra padānugatāni caritāni bhavanti |
SA20n1332:127: tadyathā kṛṣṇasyakutapasya nirbhāsaḥ andhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ |
SA20n1332:129: ye punardvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ jyotiḥ parāyaṇāsteṣāmayamevaṃrūpo manomayo'ntarābhavo nirvartate |
SA20n1332:130: tadyathā jyotsnayā rātryā vārāṇaseyakasya vā sampannasya vastrasya |
SA20n1332:136: sa samutthānayā śīlavipattyā kāyavāṅma noduścaritena samanvāgatā ityucyante |
SA20n1332:137: dvividhayā mithyādarśanadṛṣṭivipattyā samanvāgamāt sarvāpavādikayā tanmatavipakṣāvasthitāryapavādikayā ca mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ āryāṇāmapavādakā ityucyante |
SA20n1332:149: adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca tayā tatra yānaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1332:154: iti yena copapadyante upapannāśca yadupabhuñjate tadupabhogācca punaryadanyat svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkhāntaramabhinirvartayanti tadetadābhiḥ saṃjñābhiḥ paridīpitam |
SA20n1332:159: sarvāsravāṇāmaśeṣānuśayaprahāṇādyattat prātipakṣikamanāsravaṃ cittamanāśravā prajñāparamādhiprajñasaṃgṛhītā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayādanāsravā cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktirityucyate |
SA20n1332:160: tāṃ punaścetovimuktiṃ [prajñāvimukti] tasminneva carame bhave pratyātmaṃ ṣaṣṭhābhijñayā darśanamārgasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāmārga-sanniśrayeṇa cādhigamya svañcādhigamaṃ yathāvatprajānanti |
SA20n1332:162: tasmād dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvopa-saṃpadya pravedayantītyucyante |
SA20n1332:163: kṣīṇāṃ me jātirityevamādīnāṃ padānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1332:175: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ samāsato daśa tathāgatabalāni veditavyāni |
SA20n1332:180: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ na tu śraddhābalaṃ vā tadanyadvā balamityucyate |
SA20n1332:194: iyameṣāṃ samatā vihāraviśeṣastu tathāgatānāmanyonyaṃ bhavedanyena balavihāreṇa anyastathāgatastadvahulavihārī bhavati |
SA20n1332:196: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ tathāgataḥ kena kiṃ karmaṃ karoti |
SA20n1332:197: sthānāsthānajñānabalena tathāgataḥ hetuñca hetutaḥ phalañca phalato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:199: karmasvakatājñānabalena tathāgataḥ svayaṃkṛta-phalopabhogatāñca karmaṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:203: indriyaparāparajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sattvānāmindriyamṛdumadhyādhimātratāñca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:208: nānādhātujñānabalena tathāgato hīnamadhyepraṇotadhātukatāśca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:209: yathendriyān yathāṣayān yathānuśayāṃśca sattvāṃsteṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādakriyayā samyagyathāyogaṃ saṃniyojayati |
SA20n1332:210: tatra yathā tathāgatāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādamanuprayacchanti tathāśrāvakabhūmau sarveṇa sarvaṃ nirantaramākhyātamuttānaṃ vivṛtaṃ prajñaptaṃ prakāśitam |
SA20n1332:212: iha tathāgato bodhisattvāsataṃ samādhisambhāragurukamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ tatprathamataḥ evamavavadati |
SA20n1332:213: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra praviviktaśayanāsanagata ekākī advitīyo yatte mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nāma vyavasthāpitamācāryopādhyāyābhyāṃ vā tadeva nāmādhyātmaṃ manasikuru |
SA20n1332:214: evañca punarmanasikuru-asti me [sa] kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate |
SA20n1332:215: yatredaṃ nāma saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ nopalapsyase |
SA20n1332:218: yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru |
SA20n1332:225: tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ |
SA20n1332:226: yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ |
SA20n1332:228: na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ] cakṣuḥprajñaptiṃ vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate |
SA20n1332:230: yena nāmnā'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā cakṣurityevaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate |
SA20n1332:231: nānyatra prakṛtyaivāśruto'parikalpita-nāmakānāmapi tasmin vastuni cakṣuriti buddhiḥ pravartate |
SA20n1332:232: na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥprajñaptiḥ āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī |
SA20n1332:234: yathā cakṣuṣyevaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyeṣu vistareṇa yāvaddṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣu prāpteṣu paryeṣiteṣu manasā'nuvitarkiteṣvanuvicāriteṣu samāsataḥ sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñā utpannā bhaviṣyati pratilabdhā |
SA20n1332:235: evaṃ [te] svātmani yā saṃjñā [avasthā] tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati |
SA20n1332:236: vistareṇa yāvatsarvadharmeṣu yā saṃjñā tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati |
SA20n1332:237: sa tvamevaṃ sarvajñeya-suvicāritayā buddhyā evaṃ te sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñayā sarvadharmeṣu sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāmapanīyāpanīya nirvikāreṇa cetasā nirnimittenārthamātragrahaṇapravṛttenāsmin vastuni bahalaṃ vihara |
SA20n1332:239: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi |
SA20n1332:240: sa cenmaitrī midaṃpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ dhātuprabhedamānāpānasmṛtiṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vistareṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyanamapramāṇa-bodhisattva dhyānābhijñā-samādhisamāpattīrmanasikaroṣi |
SA20n1332:242: evaṃ te'yaṃ bodhisattva manaskāro'nupūrveṇa yāvadanuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye niryāsyatīti |
SA20n1332:247: śrāvako'pi cānena manaskāreṇa prayujyamānaḥ kṣiprābhijñataraḥ syād dharmābhisamayāya yadi śaknuyādetaṃ manasikāraṃ yathāvatprativeddhum |
SA20n1332:248: sarvatrāgaminī pratipat jñānabalena tathāgataḥ sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīmanairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:250: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati |
SA20n1332:254: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ |
SA20n1332:258: sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate |
SA20n1332:260: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati |
SA20n1332:261: vyavalokya kāmadhātāveva sabhāge dhātāviṣṭaphala-viśeṣārthikānāṃ karmasvakatā-jñānabalenākuśalakarmaparivarjanāṃ kuśalakarmasamudācāratāñca vyapadiśati |
SA20n1332:268: tataścānurūpeṇālambanāvatāramukhaprayogena cittasthitiñca grāhayitvā caritāni ca viśodhayitvā satkāyadṛṣṭimūla-śvāśatocchedāntagrāhavivarjitāṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ vyapadiśati sarvakleśaprahāṇāya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena cyutyupapattijñānabalena ca |
SA20n1332:269: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena |
SA20n1332:272: iha tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati |
SA20n1332:273: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] |
SA20n1332:275: kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā |
SA20n1332:277: sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati |
SA20n1332:279: santi sattvā loke jātā [ loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti |
SA20n1332:281: tataḥ pūrvavatsarvānukramo nānādhimuktyādikānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ balānāṃ veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:284: pūrvaṃ tāvattathāgato'bhisaṃbudhyamātra eva sthānāsthānajñānabalena pratītyasamutpannaṃ dharmadhātuṃ vicārayati |
SA20n1332:285: tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati |
SA20n1332:286: amī sattvā evaṃ rūpasya svayaṃkṛtasya karmaṇa evaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavantīti |
SA20n1332:287: dharmadhātuṃ [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati |
SA20n1332:288: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati |
SA20n1332:290: tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ |
SA20n1332:291: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt |
SA20n1332:292: yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati |
SA20n1332:294: yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti |
SA20n1332:323: prakṛtisthaṃ bījaṃ pūrvābhyāsasamutthitaṃ bījaṃ viśodhyaṃ bījam |
SA20n1332:334: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1332:346: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti |
SA20n1332:351: vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ |
SA20n1332:353: tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ |
SA20n1332:356: ataḥ pratijñāviguṇāṃ dvayoḥ pūrvayoḥ sthānayoḥ kāyavāṅmanaśceṣṭāṃ pratijñāviguṇāṃ ca dvayoḥ paścimayoḥ sthānayoḥ pūrvāparavirodhatāmayuktipatitāñcāpareṣāṃ divyadṛśāṃ cādivyadṛśāñca paracittavidāmaparicittavidāṃ ca pratijñānasthānapratipakṣeṇa saṃcodanāyāṃ nimittabhūtāmasamanupaśyan yenaitāni sthānāni viśārado'līnacitto nirāśaṅko nirbhīḥ pratijānāti |
SA20n1332:357: etāvacca śāstrā pratijñātavyam yaduta paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ parahitapratipattiśca |
SA20n1332:358: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati |
SA20n1332:364: yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1332:368: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti |
SA20n1332:369: tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate |
SA20n1332:376: tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante |
SA20n1332:379: etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt |
SA20n1332:385: api tu niṣṭhuraṃ pratipadyate nāsya teṣvanurakṣā utpadyate |
SA20n1332:386: mā haiva me śrāvakāḥ saṃvāsānvayādapariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥ-samudācāratāṃ viditvā tena vastunā'nāttamanaskā anabhirāddhyāścodayiṣyanti |
SA20n1332:388: tatra tathāgatānāṃ mahākaruṇā sarvākārā yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭā pūjāsevāpramāṇapaṭale veditavyā |
SA20n1332:390: tatra tathāgatasyānuṣṭeyaṃ yacca bhavati [yatra ca bhavati] yathā ca bhavati yadā ca bhavati tatra tasya tathā tadā samyaganuṣṭhānādiyaṃ tathāgatasyāsammoṣadharmatetyucyate |
SA20n1332:391: iti yā ca tatra tathāgatasya sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvakṛtyopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu smṛtyasaṃpramoṣatā sadopasthitasmṛtitā |
SA20n1332:393: tatra yā tathāgatasya spandite vā prekṣite vā kathite vā vihāre vā kleśasadbhāvasadṛśaṃ ceṣṭā'samudācāra-pracāratā |
SA20n1332:395: arhatāṃ punaḥ prahīṇakleśānāmapi kleśasadbhāvasadṛśī ceṣṭā spandita-prekṣita-kathita-vihṛteṣu bhavatyeva |
SA20n1332:403: tatra yacca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ yacca varajñānaṃ tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sarvākāravarajñānamityucyate |
SA20n1332:405: tatra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānyanena bodhisattvabhūtena carame bhave supariśuddhāni pratilabdhāni bhavanti |
SA20n1332:406: yadā tu bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati suparipūrṇa-bodhisaṃbhāramārgo bodhisattvaḥ paścime bhave tadāsāvanācāryakaṃ saptatriṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayannekakṣaṇānāvaraṇajñānadaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate śaikṣyabhūtasya bodhisattvasya vajropamasamādhi-saṃgṛhītam |
SA20n1332:407: tasyānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe pariśiṣṭānāṃ daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāra-varajñāna-paryavasānānāṃ suviśuddhatāṃ niruttaratāṃ sakṛtpratilabhate |
SA20n1332:408: teṣāñca lābhāt sarvasmin jñeye'saktamanāvaraṇaṃ suviśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate ābhogamātra-pratibaddham |
SA20n1332:412: sāragatasya ca jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyasya niravaśeṣaṃ prahāṇādasyāśrayaḥ parivṛtto bhavati |
SA20n1332:414: anyāḥ sarvāḥ paramavihārāvasānā bodhisattvānāmāśrayaparivṛttayaḥ sottarā eva veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1332:415: tatra niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya ca bodhisattvasya [tathāgatasya ca kathaṃ jñānaviśeṣo'vagantavyo jñānāntaram |
SA20n1332:416: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya] pelavapaṭāntaritaṃ yathācakṣuṣmato rūpadarśanam |
SA20n1332:417: evaṃ tasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1332:420: tadyathā sarvākāraraṃga-paripūrṇaṃ citrakarma paścimayā suviśuddhayā raṃgalekhayā'pariśodhitam |
SA20n1332:426: tadyathā cakṣuṣmata ārādrūpadarśanam evaṃ evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā āsanne evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat |
SA20n1332:427: yathā mṛdutaimirikasya rūpadarśanam evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā suviśuddha-cakṣuṣaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat |
SA20n1332:428: yathā garbhagatasyātmabhāva evaṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:430: yathārhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya cittapracārastathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:431: yathā tasyaiva prativibuddhasya cittapracāra evaṃ tathāgatasya draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:432: tadyathā pradīpasyāviśuddhasya svabhāvaḥ tathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:433: yathā suviśuddhasya pradīpasya svabhāvaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:435: evamabhisaṃbuddho bodhistathāgato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti |
SA20n1332:441: sve mahāpuruṣabhāve ādita eva cittaprasādakārakamahāpuruṣa [bhāva] saṃpratyayajananā prathamaṃ tathā [ gata] kṛtyaṃ tacca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaiḥ sampādayati |
SA20n1332:442: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvākārāvavādaprayogatathāgatakṛtyaṃ [ yat] catasrabhiḥ sarvākārapariśuddhibhiḥ sampādayati |
SA20n1332:445: yattathāgato daśabhirtāthāgatabalaiḥ sampādayati tathā hi tathāgato daśabhiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairvalaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthasampādanaṃ prati samartho bhavati |
SA20n1332:446: ye cainaṃ tathāgatabalānyārabhya praśnaṃ pṛcchanti yathā yāni tathāgatena jñātāni dṛṣṭāni viditāni vijñātāni tathā tāni tathāgatasteṣāṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākaroti |
SA20n1332:448: yattathāgato vaiśāradyaiḥ sampādayati tathāgatājñāyāṃ sthiteṣvasyiteṣu ca vineyeṣvasaṃkliṣṭacittatā pañcamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam |
SA20n1332:449: yattathāgataḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ sampādayati yathāvādi tathākāritā ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam |
SA20n1332:450: yattathāgataḥ arakṣyaiḥ sampādayati buddhacakṣuṣā rātrindivaṃ sarvalokavyavalokanā saptamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam |
SA20n1332:453: yattathāgato'sammoṣadharmatayā sampādayati tathāgatasyācāravihārasya yathāvadanuvartanā adhitiṣṭhanā navamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam |
SA20n1332:454: yattathāgato vāsanāsamuddhātena sampādayati ye dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā ye ca naivārthopasaṃhitānānārthopasaṃhitāstānabhinirvarjya ye ca dharmā arthopasaṃhitāsteṣāṃ samākhyānaṃ vivaraṇā uttānīkarme daśamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam |
SA20n1332:455: yattathāgataḥ sarvākāravarajñānena sampādayati evaṃ hi tathāgato'nenāveṇikena catvāriṃśaduttareṇa buddhadharmaśatena daśatathāgata kṛtyāni kurvan sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti |
SA20n1332:456: vistaravibhāgataḥ punarasyaiva buddhakāryasya na sukarāsaṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi |
SA20n1332:457: ayaṃ sa tathāgato vihārastathāgatī bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhetyucyate |
SA20n1332:459: etāmāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya yasyāḥ spṛhayamāṇarūpā bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante adhigamyāpi ca tāṃ pratiṣṭhāmetāmevāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthān sāmpādayati |
SA20n1332:461: sarve caite buddhadharmā atyarthaṃ parārthakriyānukūlāḥ parārthakriyāprabhāvitāśca tathāgatānām |
SA20n1332:464: santi ca te buddhadharmā ye sarveṇa sarvaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu nopalabhyante |
SA20n1332:467: tathāgatasya tu sarve copalabhyante sarvākāraparipūrṇāścātikrāntatarāśca praṇītatarāśca |
SA20n1332:472: sarvabodhisattva-śikṣāmārgasya śikṣāmārgaphalasya ca tarvākārasya nirdeśāya adhiṣṭhānabhūtam sā khalviyaṃ bodhisattvabhūmirbodhisattvapiṭakamātṛketyapyucyate |
SA20n1332:476: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā [surā] llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāsyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau dṛḍhāmadhimuktimutpādyemāṃ śroṣyatyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyati pūjāsatkārañca prayokṣyate |
SA20n1332:477: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ |
SA20n1332:479: tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni |
SA20n1332:480: yāvaccāsyāṃ [bodhisattva] bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti saddharmāntarddhānāya |
SA20n1332:481: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati |
SA20n1332:482: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam
SA20n1332:485: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat |
SA20n1332:486: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
